<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Emergency Targe](/Feats.aspx?ID=2855) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=389" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 44 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[sparkling targe hybrid study](/HybridStudies.aspx?ID=3)

**Trigger**
An enemy hits you with a melee Strike or a melee spell attack roll, or you fail a save against an enemy's spell.

**Requirements**
You are wielding a shield or have the [_shield_](/Spells.aspx?ID=280) spell prepared.

</column>

---

You immediately [Raise a Shield](/Actions.aspx?ID=98) or cast _shield_. The circumstance bonus applies to your defenses when determining the outcome of the triggering attack or spell.
